page.title: 06SPORTS IN SITTINGBOURNE
page.content: Generally speaking there are good sport's facilities for adults and children in Sittingbourne.The town has its own football club which is well supported,and there are literally dozens of youth and adult clubs in and around the town.St.John's and Rowena Schools house a large sport's centre. They offer squash,badminton,table tennis,basket ball and more!There is also a sport's centre in East Street that offers judo ,karate,yoga, weight-training,and keep-fit classes. Gore Court Cricket Club has a high reputation,and most of the districts within the town have smaller cricket clubs which play in local leagues. The swimming pool has public and club sessions, and although popular,is in need of renewal.There is a popular athletics club run at Highsted School.
